channel.title: Some questions for you all , much appreciated for any answers!
channel.description:
How would i change the drop rate of monsters?
How would i change the orb telleport coords? (delta orb telleports , names & coords))
How can i add drops to a npc?
Thanks,
-Lewis.

item.title: Some questions for you all , much appreciated for any answers!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Drop rate of monsters, go into config, npcdrops.cfg, after you get that far you will see what the adding drops is for. As for the teleport orbs, its in clickingmost.java, for the text and area.

Read full topic
item.source: Some questions for you all , much appreciated for any answers!
